trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Bangor
There were no other sightings in Bangor on or around April 27th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in the back yard with my dog and saw a red flashing light which is usually a plane then when i turned my head i saw a bright moving star like object moving at a fast speed with no sound, when i called my son to look we went to the front of the house for a better look but it had gone.
